about_the_game:
The second full-length RPG created using the RPG Maker series "RPG maker unite"!

Overview

- The battle is a side-view turn-based command input format in the style of an old-fashioned JRPG.

- The map is a 2D top-down view. You can run around a more realistic and vast field than the previous game. There are over 400 maps and 21 dungeons. There are various mechanisms and mysteries such as traps and puzzles.

- A blockbuster with an open field-like world and a grand adventure with a rich storyline, with a play time of 60 hours. It is even more full-length than the previous game "Why do I have so many sisters?!"

- The content has a strong comedy touch, but there are also serious scenes and puzzle-solving elements, making it a very varied game. There are also many fun conversations between the sisters, so it can be enjoyed as an ADV game.

・In addition to the unique sister skills from the previous game, this game also has a variety of unique skills, such as creating gadgets by combining materials and chemical skills by picking up chemicals to learn skills.

・Defeat powerful enemies that appear one after another with your unique skills and friends who use them. If you like challenging RPGs, you will definitely like it.

・The game has a long play time, but for busy people, a cheat play mode has been implemented. The character starts at level 90 and has an accessory that disables random encounters from the beginning. It is also recommended for those who want to enjoy the ADV elements.

Story

The protagonist and his sister Aina were wandering the universe on the spaceship Love Nest. However, one day they were suddenly drawn to a mysterious planet and made an emergency landing on it.

The name of that planet is Sisteria. A planet with a unique (slightly unusual) culture where sisters are cherished and have a high social status.

And for some reason, the protagonist and Aina were treated as residents of Sisteria from the beginning. At first, the protagonists were prepared to survive on the mysterious planet, but they don't seem too unhappy after receiving presents and even having housing provided for them.

However, things can't continue like this.

In order to escape from Sisteria, they go around looking for an energy source to fly their ship. However, Sisteria is a civilization at a level where light-speed space travel is not even possible, so it's difficult to find a usable energy source.

The protagonists begin to wonder if they should just give up and live in Sisteria.

There, they learn that a serious crisis is approaching Sisteria...

content_descriptors.notes:
The developer describes the content as follows:

Some scenes in the game contain depictions and dialogue of sexual acts that are inappropriate for minors. It also contains incestuous content, so if you are uncomfortable with such content, we do not recommend playing the game.

The text contains content that suggests or is reminiscent of minors engaging in sexual acts, regardless of whether there is consent or the age of other characters involved in the situation.

Some monsters include depictions of zombies, corpses, and blood.

Some skills used in the game use harmful drugs to attack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10&11
  • Processor: Dual core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10&11
  • Processor: Quad core CPU
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Storage: 4700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended, NVME better.

short_description: "Immortal Survivor!" is a 2D top-down JRPG created by RPG maker unite. Adventure in a vast and realistic world with the protagonist and his sisters who have crash-landed on the mysterious planet Sisteria, and unravel the mysteries and mysteries that cover the world.
